'''Radiant Spincrystal 106''' is an item used in any [[Furnishing]] of the [[Euphonium Unbound]] series to unlock the [[Soundtrack]] ''[[Que le vent soit doux]]'' in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

It is located on top of a mountain in the south-west part of [[Elynas]], [[Beryl Region]], [[Fontaine]].
